name: Ninja Jump: Endless Jumping Game Free
name_original: Ninja Jump: Endless Jumping Game Free
description:
There has been a rash of productivity! This app will surely bring you back to wasting hours upon hours.

3,2,1...Jump! Tap to make the shuriken jump while avoiding the obstacles to become a ninja master. Keep avoiding obstacles to get the highest score.

It seems impossible, but it is not. The owner of the game has a high score of 8. E-mail info@awellrunlife.com if you beat him.
